text: The Polish złoty is the currency of Poland. The word złoty means "gold". == Banknotes == *10 złotych **60 × 120 mm **Color brown **Obverse:Mieszko I **Reverse:A silver denar coin during the reign of Mieszk. *20 złotych **126 × 63 mm **Obverse:Bolesław I **Reverse:A silver denar coin during the reign of Bolesław. *50 złotych **132 × 66 mm **Obverse:Casimir III **Reverse:A white eagle *100 złotych **138 × 69 mm **Obverse:Władysław II Jagiełło **Reverse:Shield bearing a White Eagle *200 złotych **144 × 72 mm **Obverse:Sigismund I **Reverse:Eagle intertwined with the letter S in a hexagon *500 złotych **150 × 75 mm **Obverse:John III Sobieski **Reverse:Wilanów Palace == Coins == There are złoty coins of: *1 złoty *2 złote *5 złotych Category:Currency of Europe Category:Economy of Poland
title: Złoty
